item.title: Blackhole
item.description: A black hole is a place in space where gravity pulls so much that even light can not get out. The gravity is so strong because matter has been squeezed into a tiny space. This can happen when a star is dying. Because no light can get out, people can’t see black holes. They are invisible. Space telescopes with special tools can help find black holes. The special tools can see how stars that are very close to black holes act differently than other stars.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello! Visitors First of all thankyou for visiting my Website. I ‘Ayush Sharma’, a First Year Undergraduate at Institute of Engineering and Technology(Lucknow). I am currently Pursuing my Bachelors of Technology(B.Tech) from Electronics and Communication Branch. I have a great interest in Web Development, AI, Machine Learning and Product Management. This is my First Website and working hard to make another one in future.
